name: Twister Mania
description: The Games on Demand version supports English.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor.  Kick start the party with friends and family in the hysterical fast-paced game inspired by the global phenomenon:  Twister®! Don’t hold back as you bend and twist your body into thousands of shapes to fit through forms, match a mirrored image and more! Twister Mania is the only game that gets you moving in ways you never thought possible!  • Master 3 hilarious game modes with 16 ways to play • Twirl the virtual spinner and advance around the mat in Party Play with all game modes  • Relive hilarious Twister Mania moments with post-gameplay photos • Play solo, team up or battle head-to-head with up to 7 other players in turn based pairs  This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".
